description.value:
Trigger A living creature bearing Hunger's Call moves within 30 feet of the exit stairs

Effect Blood pounds in the targe's body as their heart races uncontrollably. The creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20|name:Resist Racing Blood|traits:complex] save, and the haunt then rolls initiative.

Critical Success The target is unaffected.

Success The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 1}.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Sickened]{Sickened 2}.

Critical Failure As failure, and the target's move speed is reduced by 10 for 1 minute.

details.description: The image of a ghostly warrior her holy symbol dripping blood and pulsing with negative energy, steps from the wall and seeks to kill any living creature.
details.disable: @Check[type:religion|dc:20|name:Exorcise Spirit|traits:complex,haunt] (trained) to exorcise the spirit, @Check[type:religion|dc:21|name:Sever Spiritual Connection|traits:complex,haunt] or @Check[type:occultism|dc:21|name:Sever Spiritual Connection|traits:complex,haunt] (trained) to sever the connection between Hunger's Call and the temple, or @Check[type:thievery|dc:21|name:Scratch Eyes out of the Mural|traits:complex,haunt] (trained) to scratch the eyes out of the mural; three total successes are required to disable the haunt.
details.reset: The spectral warrior returns to the wall and ceases 2 rounds after all living creatures are out of sight of the stairs. After 6 hours the haunt is ready to trigger again.
details.routine: (3 actions) The warrior's blade sweeps through the bodies of any living creature within sight of the exit stairs, and they each take [[/r {1d10+4}[slashing]]]{1d10+4 slashing damage} (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:20|basic:true|name:Avoid the Warrior's Blade|traits:complex,haunt,slashing] save). Undead creatures in the area gain 5 temporary hit points.

source.value: Pathfinder Society Intro #2: United in Purpose
